mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Answer WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum} ORDER BY CASE WHEN replyParents = 0 THEN replyNum ELSE replyParents END, replyNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Answer(boardNum, replyContent, userID, replyDate, replyGID, replyOrder, replyParents) VALUES(#{boardNum}, #{replyContent}, #{userID}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), #{replyGID}, #{replyOrder}, #{replyParents})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Answer WHERE replyNum = #{replyNum} or replyGID = #{replyGID}
